name: Emoji Shuffle!
description:
Emoji Shuffle is a matching puzzle game using your favorite characters on the Internet! What? No. Not cats. Emojis!

Tired of texting? Waiting for the train? Need a break from your desk? No worries. One game of Emoji Shuffle takes about three minutes.

• QUICK AND EASY GAMEPLAY
All you have to do is swipe to match emojis. It’s that easy!

• NEW EMOJI
Getting bored of the normal smiley emojis? That’s okay - you can even play as puppies, kitties, or even aliens!
